alert.note: Alert for Delaware Beaches; Inland Sussex; Kent (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 28 at 9:42AM EST until December 28 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...In Delaware, Kent, Inland Sussex and Delaware Beaches. In New Jersey, Cumberland. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At this level, flooding begins on the most vulnerable roads in coastal and bayside communities, and along inland tidal waterways. Some partial or full road closures are possible. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Murderkill River at Bowers Beach MLLW Categories - Minor 6.6 ft, Moderate 7.6 ft, Major 8.6 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 0.9 ft, Moderate 1.9 ft, Major 2.9 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 28/10 AM 7.0 1.3 1.8 Minor 28/10 PM 5.6 -0.1 1.9 None 29/11 AM 6.9 1.2 1.8 Minor 29/11 PM 5.4 -0.3 1.8 None 30/11 AM 6.3 0.6 1.5 None 31/12 AM 4.8 -0.9 1.2 None Delaware Bay at Lewes MLLW Categories - Minor 6.0 ft, Moderate 7.0 ft, Major 8.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 28/09 AM 6.4 1.8 1.6 Minor 28/10 PM 4.9 0.2 1.5 None 29/10 AM 5.9 1.2 1.3 None 29/10 PM 4.7 0.0 1.4 None 30/11 AM 5.5 0.8 1.0 None 30/11 PM 3.9 -0.8 0.6 None Maurice River at Bivalve MLLW Categories - Minor 7.6 ft, Moderate 8.6 ft, Major 9.6 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 28/10 AM 7.9 1.6 1.8 Minor 28/10 PM 6.6 0.3 1.6 None 29/10 AM 7.3 1.0 1.4 None 29/11 PM 6.4 0.1 1.5 None 30/11 AM 6.9 0.6 1.1 None 31/12 AM 5.5 -0.8 0.7 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
